Class ObjectBufferWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.avgl.dmp.converter.sink.ObjectBufferWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.culturegraph.mf.framework.LifeCycle, org.culturegraph.mf.framework.ObjectReceiver<java.lang.String>

    @Description(value="Buffers all input Strings into a StringBuffer")
@In(value=java.lang.String.class)
public class ObjectBufferWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.culturegraph.mf.framework.ObjectReceiver<java.lang.String>
    Buffers all input Stringss into a @{link StringBuffer}. Retrieve the buffered value by calling toString().
    Author:
    Paul Horn
